CEO Eric Schmidt says Mountain View is preparing to spearhead a mobile revolution that will help redefine the role of the smartphone. According to Eric Schmidt , a handset will soon be capable of delivering streaming personalized information about where you are[ and] what you could do there in real-time and at scale.
